snippet: Maya Moore scored 18 points as the United States beat Spain, 77-64, to win its second straight gold medal at the women’s world championship in Istanbul.
lead_paragraph: Maya Moore scored 18 points as the United States beat Spain, 77-64, to win its second straight gold medal at the women’s world championship in Istanbul.

headline.main: U.S. Women Edge Spain to Win Gold Again
headline.print_headline: US women beat Spain to win world championship
